summary: A FedEx invoice dated December 23, 2002, detailing shipping charges for account holder Jeffrey E. Epstein. The document lists numerous shipments sent from and to Epstein's New York address, with various recipients including known associates and entities, providing a snapshot of his communications and logistics during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Primary account holder for the FedEx invoice; shipments are sent from and to his Madison Avenue address. He is also listed as a recipient on several packages sent to his Palm Beach address.

persons.name: G Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (signed by MAXWELL) and as a sender (G MAXWELL) on packages shipped via Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as both a sender and recipient on multiple packages billed to Epstein's FedEx account, indicating shared use of his corporate shipping account.
Edwina Simmonds is listed as a recipient on multiple packages shipped via Epstein's account, suggesting she was staff or an associate receiving items on his behalf.
A package was shipped to Ella Dershowitz using Epstein's FedEx account, indicating a personal or professional connection.

events.title: FedEx Shipping Activity
events.description: Numerous FedEx shipments were sent and received under Jeffrey Epstein's account throughout December 2002, involving various associates and locations.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account (1144-2081-6) was active in December 2002, with an invoice totaling $772.39 for 34 express shipments and ground services.

Shipments were sent from Epstein's New York address (457 Madison Ave) to various individuals, including Ghislaine Maxwell (listed as G Maxwell, S Maxwell, and SABEL MAXWELL), Edwina Simmonds, and Ella Dershowitz.
Several packages were also sent to Epstein's Palm Beach, Florida address (358 El Brillo Way), indicating movement of materials between his residences.
The document shows Epstein's network of associates and staff using his corporate account for personal and business shipments.
Address corrections and failed delivery attempts on several packages suggest logistical issues or incorrect recipient information.
